Description:
Detects the deletion of the event log files which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: EventLog EVTX File Deleted
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where filepath like 'c:\windows\system32\winevt\logs\%' and filepath like '%.evtx'
